thread.title: North Korea details steps to destroy nuclear site

title: North Korea details steps to destroy nuclear site
text:
North Korea details steps to destroy nuclear site 9:15pm BST - 01:33
North Korea has scheduled the dismantlement of its Punggye-ri nuclear test site for sometime between May 23 and 25, depending on weather conditions, in order to uphold its pledge to discontinue nuclear tests, according to the country's state media. Jillian Kitchener reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
